name: Five Nights at Sonic's (Sanchik Edition)
description:
STORY

Stay 5 nights at Sonic's Pizzeria and try to stay away from Sonic and friends. Their nightmarish madness will increase as you progress. Can you stay five nights at Sonic's?

MECHANICS

(Cameras) shock whatever comes into the kitchen

(Office) wear the mask whenever something comes into your office

To save progress type in the code for the night and press "continue".

CREDITS

Scott Cawthon - music, sounds, gameplay, thank you so much!
